Presentation.title: Hi! I am Victor! üëã
Presentation.subtitle: Fullstack developer
Presentation.text: I have been deepening my knowledge in the field of development for the past 2 years. Every day, I am more motivated to find new ways to evolve. With a solid foundation, I am always looking for new opportunities to collaborate in creating innovative projects and impactful experiences.

Projects.title: Main Projects
Projects.portfolios-desc: Create your portfolio or view other programmers' portfolios. Login system, likes, infinite scrolling, and much more!
Projects.arc-desc: Create, edit, and read articles. Login system, categories, article search, and more!
Projects.pag-desc: API to provide pagination items. Better than any other: edit fields, pages, types, and returns. Makes testing pagination in any system easier.
Projects.bing-desc: Yes, you read that right! A fully realistic bingo game: number drawing, cards, and for added excitement, opponents!
Projects.cri-desc: Proprietary encryption method. It allows encoding and decoding of messages.
